title: Chapter 1 Season 7
body: Jump into Chapter 1 Season 7 all over again — explore Mega City, slice through enemies with the Kinetic Blade, and ride the rails to the finish line.
author: Epic Games

title: Chapter 1 Season X beta
body: Experience the wild frontier of Chapter 2 Season 5 — hunt bounties, explore the desert, and survive in this lawless land.
author: Epic Games
